text: Antonio Stradivari (1644 18 December 1737) was an Italian luthier (a person who makes stringed instruments). He made violins, violas, cellos, guitars, and harps. The instruments he made are called Stradivarius, or Strad for short. Many people think that he is the greatest violin maker. Around 650 of the instruments he made survive. == References == Category:1644 births Category:1737 deaths Category:Luthiers Category:People from Cremona
title: Antonio Stradivari
